title: “It’s still on the studio shelf”: TPUSA clears air after Candace Owens speculates on Charlie Kirk wedding photo moved by Erika Kirk
summary_full: Turning Point USA confirmed to Newsweek that Erika Kirk moved her wedding photo with Charlie Kirk to a lower shelf so her daughter could reach it. The clarification came after online users and Candace Owens questioned why the picture was missing in a December 2025 interview. Owens offered theories, but no evidence showed the photo was removed permanently.
